column4: Hello, I am really new to Linux and I have a couple question: 1) I want to disable my onboard audio and enable my soundblaster audigy, they are both detected in device manager but I don't how to control them
i know what you NEED to do, i just don't know how.
you need to blacklist the kernel module that runs your onboard sound card from autoloading
at least that will point you in the right direction
